# FortoolSEO Blog - AI Coding Agent Instructions

## Project Overview
FortoolSEO is a **Jekyll-based static SEO blog** (hosted on GitHub Pages) focused on Indonesian SEO tutorials and digital marketing content. Posts are written in HTML with YAML frontmatter, auto-generated via `_scripts/auto-generator.js`, and enhanced with Ruby plugins for metadata optimization.

## Architecture

### Core Directory Structure
- **`_posts/`** ‚Äì HTML blog articles with YAML frontmatter (date-slug.html format)
- **`_layouts/`** ‚Äì Jekyll templates; `default.html` is the main layout
- **`_includes/`** ‚Äì Reusable Liquid components: `post-card.html` (card UI), `pagination.html`, `post-card.html` (image extraction)
- **`_plugins/`** ‚Äì Ruby filters: `image_alt_filter.rb` auto-generates alt text from post title or content
- **`_scripts/`** ‚Äì Node.js automation; `auto-generator.js` scaffolds new posts with SEO structure
- **`_config.yml`** ‚Äì Jekyll configuration with SEO plugins (jekyll-paginate, jekyll-sitemap, jekyll-seo-tag)

### Data Flow
1. **Post Generation**: `auto-generator.js` creates HTML files with predefined SEO sections
2. **Jekyll Build**: Processes YAML frontmatter, applies `default.html` layout
3. **Plugin Processing**: `image_alt_filter.rb` injects auto-generated alt text if missing
4. **Output**: Static HTML served via GitHub Pages

## Critical Conventions

### Post Frontmatter (Required Fields)
All posts in `_posts/` must have this YAML structure:
```yaml
---
layout: default
title: "Article Title"
date: YYYY-MM-DD
categories: ["Category"]  # e.g., ["SEO"]
tags: ["tag1", "tag2"]
author: "Admin FortoolSEO"
excerpt: "Summary text"
meta_description: "Meta description for SEO"
---
```

### Post Filename Format
- Pattern: `YYYY-MM-DD-slug-title.html`
- Slug: lowercase, hyphens, max 60 chars (see `auto-generator.js` generateSlug function)
- Example: `2025-12-19-cara-optimasi-seo-onpage-untuk-pemula.html`

### HTML Content Structure
Posts follow a consistent template (see `_scripts/auto-generator.js`):
1. **`<h1>`** ‚Äì Article title
2. **`.article-meta`** ‚Äì Date, category, author, tags (emojis: üìÖüìÇüë§üè∑Ô∏è)
3. **`.toc`** ‚Äì Table of contents with anchor links
4. **Sections** ‚Äì H2 headings with IDs: `#pengenalan`, `#manfaat`, `#langkah`, `#tools`, `#tips`, `#kesimpulan`
5. **Tool Cards** ‚Äì `.tools-grid` with `.tool-card` divs (for tool recommendations)

### Image Handling
- The `image_alt_filter.rb` Ruby plugin auto-generates alt text:
  - Reads first 120 chars of nearest text or post title
  - Falls back to "Gambar untuk artikel: {title}" if no alt exists
  - Used in `_includes/post-card.html` for lazy-loading thumbnails
- **When editing posts:** Ensure images have src attributes; alt text is auto-generated

### Jekyll/Liquid Templates
- **Conditionals**: Use Liquid `{% if page.url contains "/categories/" %}` to customize output for category/tag pages
- **Loops**: Posts use `{% for post in site.posts %}` in index.html
- **Filters**: Custom filters registered in Ruby plugins (e.g., `| auto_alt` filter)

## Development Workflows

### Generate New Post
```bash
node _scripts/auto-generator.js
```
- Prompts for title, category, tags
- Creates HTML file in `_posts/` with SEO template
- Output filename uses date + slug

### Build & Test Locally
```bash
# Install dependencies (if not using bundler)
gem install jekyll jekyll-paginate jekyll-sitemap jekyll-seo-tag

# Build static site
jekyll build

# Serve locally (watch mode)
jekyll serve
# Access at http://localhost:4000
```

### Linting & Quality
- No automated linters currently configured
- Manual checks: ensure YAML frontmatter validity, valid HTML5, alt text on images

## Key Integration Points

### Jekyll Configuration (`_config.yml`)
- **Markdown**: kramdown (but .html posts bypass markdown processor)
- **Permalink**: `/:categories/:title/` ‚Äì posts accessible by category
- **Plugins**: jekyll-paginate (8 posts/page at `/blog/page:num/`), jekyll-sitemap, jekyll-seo-tag
- **Include**: `.html` and `.md` files in `_posts/`, categories, and `_includes`

### Ruby Plugin System
- **Filter registration**: `Liquid::Template.register_filter()`
- Custom filters can process post content at build time

### Static Files
- **`sitemap.xml`** ‚Äì Auto-generated by jekyll-sitemap for SEO
- **`feed.xml`** ‚Äì RSS feed linked in default layout
- **`robots.txt`** ‚Äì Crawl directives
- **`categories/` & tags/`** ‚Äì Auto-generated category/tag index pages

## Common Patterns & Gotchas

### When Adding New Posts
1. Use `auto-generator.js` or manually create file with correct frontmatter
2. Ensure **date is YYYY-MM-DD** (Jekyll requires this format)
3. Wrap category and tags in **square brackets** (YAML arrays)
4. Include both `excerpt` and `meta_description` (used in SEO meta tags)

### Image Alt Text Generation
- The plugin scans content for `<img>` tags and auto-fills missing alt attributes
- If post has no images, default alt is "Ilustrasi artikel SEO"
- **Do not manually edit** alt attributes if relying on auto-generation; regenerate post at build time

### Pagination & Paths
- Homepage loops through `site.posts` (reverse chronological)
- Pagination uses `/blog/page:num/` pattern (8 posts per page)
- Category pages in `categories/{category}/index.html` (auto-linked from frontmatter)

### Language & Locale
- Site language: Indonesian (`language: "id"`, `locale: "id_ID"`)
- Date format in templates: `{{ post.date | date: "%d %B %Y" }}` (outputs "19 Desember 2025")

- [Image alt filter](/_plugins/image_alt_filter.rb) ‚Äì Auto-generating image metadata
- [Layout defaults](/_layouts/default.html#L1-L30) ‚Äì SEO meta tags, Liquid conditionals
- [Post card component](/_includes/post-card.html) ‚Äì Image extraction & lazy loading
